user_stories.story: As a developer using iSDLC, I want the workflow branch to be created before any phases run, so that the main branch remains clean during the entire workflow.
As a developer who cancels a workflow during Phase 01, I want to find main branch unchanged, so that incomplete artifacts do not pollute my primary branch.
As a framework maintainer, I want the orchestrator documentation to accurately describe when branches are created, so that the behavior matches the documentation.
As a developer using iSDLC in a non-git project, I want the framework to gracefully skip branch creation with a warning, so that workflows still function without version control.
